title: 12/31/20 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/31/20 - Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best Of the Herd for December 31st, 2020, Colin takes a look at Tom Brady’s first season with the Buccaneers and why he’s already exceeded expectations before the playoffs even begin. Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to tell Colin why Buffalo QB Josh Allen is more talented than Trevor Lawrence. Colin talks about the pressure facing Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa as they fight to get into the playoffs in Week 17. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
